Name: Thermostatic Control Systems
Description: Used in HVAC systems for residential and commercial buildings.

Name: PID Control Systems
Description: Used in industrial processes, laboratory equipment, and precision temperature control systems.

Name: On/Off Control Systems
Description: Used in basic heating or cooling systems where precise control is not critical.

Name: Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC)
Description: Used in automated industrial systems, including manufacturing and process control.

Name: Cryogenic Control Systems
Description: Used in scientific research, superconducting equipment, and space applications.

Name: Thermal Management Systems in Electronics
Description: Used in electronic devices and systems (e.g., CPUs, GPUs, power supplies).

Name: Environmental Chambers
Description: Used for testing materials and products under controlled temperature and humidity conditions.

Name: Medical Temperature Control Systems
Description: Used in medical devices (e.g., incubators, blood warmers, storage of biological samples).

Name: Refrigeration and Cooling Systems
Description: Used in food storage, pharmaceuticals, and air conditioning.

Name: Smart Home Temperature Control Systems
Description: Used in smart thermostats and home automation.
